pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw: Not a high priority, but I'm inclined to say that these hardcoded values should go in a data file rather than in source files, especially if more colors will be added later. Are there later plans to make a color picker option (e.g. from a color wheel)?
content.html: Not a high priority, but I'm inclined to say that these hardcoded values should go in a data file rather than in source files, especially if more colors will be added later. Are there later plans to make a color picker option (e.g. from a color wheel)?
